EmailTemplate.name: Kevlar EE Exit
EmailTemplate.subject: DuPont™ Kevlar® Engineered Elastomers
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
January 20, 2016
Dear {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName},
DuPont is making some changes to our current portfolio of Kevlar® products. Please read the attached document. Please let me know if you have any questions.
Sincerely, Beth L Taylor ________________________________________________ DuPont Protection Technologies • Account Manager Nomex®/ Kevlar® • 5401 Jefferson Davis Highway • Richmond VA 23234 Phone: (877) 713 -1299 •Fax: (800)-876-9566• beth.l.taylor@usa.dupont.com The information contained in this letter is DuPont Confidential Information.
